dcterms:creator: M. A. Musallam
V. Gaudilliere
E. Ghorbel
K. Al Ismaeil
M. D. Perez
M. Poucet
D. Aouada
dcterms:description: The SPARK dataset includes over 150,000 synthetic RGB images, along with corresponding depth and segmentation masks. It features 10 different spacecraft models obtained from NASA’s 3D resources and 5 distinct debris objects. The images are rendered with the Unity framework.
dcterms:title: SPARK dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. Hu
S. Speierer
W. Jakob
P. Fua
M. Salzmann
dcterms:description: The SwissCube Dataset constitutes a synthetic collection featuring 50,000 images of a 1U CubeSat model based on the SwissCube satellite. These images are organized into 500 trajectories, each comprising 100 frames.
dcterms:title: SwissCube Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. A. Musallam
A. Rathinam
V. Gaudilliere
M. O. d. Castillo
D. Aouada
dcterms:description: The CubeSat Cross-Domain Trajectory (CDT) dataset comprises RGB images captured across multiple trajectories of a 1U CubeSat within three distinct domains, including synthetic and testbed domains.
dcterms:title: CubeSat Cross-Domain Trajectory (CDT) dataset

dcterms:creator: P. F. Proenc¸a
Y. Gao
dcterms:description: The Unreal Rendered Spacecraft On-Orbit (URSO) Dataset is generated using Unreal Engine 4 and features a total of 15,000 synthetic RGB images, divided into three distinct subsets focusing on different spacecraft.
dcterms:title: Unreal Rendered Spacecraft On-Orbit (URSO) Dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Sharma
T. Park
S. D’Amico
dcterms:description: The Spacecraft Pose Estimation Dataset (SPEED) contains 15,000 synthetic grayscale images, in addition to 305 images captured under testbed conditions, focusing on the Tango spacecraft.
dcterms:title: Spacecraft Pose Estimation Dataset (SPEED)

dcterms:creator: T. H. Park
M. M¨artens
G. Lecuyer
D. Izzo
S. D’Amico
dcterms:description: The Next Generation Spacecraft Pose Estimation Dataset (SPEED+) consists of 60,000 synthetic images featuring the Tango spacecraft, accompanied by pose annotations and 9,531 annotated testbed images.
dcterms:title: Next Generation Spacecraft Pose Estimation Dataset (SPEED+)

dcterms:creator: T. H. Park
S. D’Amico
dcterms:description: The Satellite Hardware-In-the-loop Rendezvous Trajectories Dataset (SHIRT) features two distinct trajectories capturing the poses of a Tango satellite from the perspective of a service spacecraft, including both synthetic and testbed images.
dcterms:title: Satellite Hardware-In-the-loop Rendezvous Trajectories Dataset (SHIRT)
